name: Snuty
description:
Snuty is an adventure game . Join the cube as he will be facing numerous blocks and challenges in his quest to freedom! 

YOUR GOAL is to get as much score as possible!

CONTROLS

  • A to move left
  • D to move right
System requirements
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
